data.rationale:
Parse::Readelf is a module to parse the output of readelf from the
    GNU binutils suite. At the moment only small parts of the debugging
    section are supported to get information about the structure layout
    of the variables of a binary object. Also only Dwarf-2 debugging
    information is understood.
